ext_descriptions.ext_description:
An Activity is the identification of the occurrence of an activity, which has taken place, is taking place, or is expected to take place in the future. The procedure executed during that Activity is identified with the Activity_method that is referred to by the chosen_method attribute.
Change, distilling, design, a process to drill a hole, and a task such as training someone, are examples of activities.
Status information identifying the level of completion of each activity may be provided within an instance of .
The items that are affected by an Activity, for example as input or output, may be identified within an instance of .
the identifier that distinguishes the Activity.
the label by which the Activity is known.
a text that provides further information about the Activity. The value of the attribute need not be specified.
the Activity_method that specifies the procedure selected to carry out the Activity.

An Activity_relationship establishes a relationship between two instances of Activity.
The activity required to complete a work order, may be decomposed into a series of activities. Their corresponding instances would be related using instances of the Activity_relationship entity.
a text that provides further information about the Activity_relationship. The value of the attribute need not be specified.
the text by which the Activity_relationship is known.

the second instance of Acivity that is part of the relationship.
The related_activity usually identifies the , which is based on the definition of the relating_activity.
The meaning of this attribute is defined by the name attribute.

the first of the instances of Activity that is part of the relationship.
The relating_activity usually identifies the activity the definition of the related_activity is based on, for example, derived from or dependent on.
The meaning of this attribute is defined by the name attribute.
An Activity_status is the assignment of a status to an Activity.
specifies the Activity to which the Activity_status applies.
the label that provides a user interpretable designation for the level of completion of the Activity.

An Applied_activity_assignment is an association of an Activity with product or activity data. It characterizes the role of the concepts represented with these data with respect to the activity.
This entity should not be used to represent the association of an activity with the organizations that are responsible for its execution or its management. That kind of information can be represented with instances of Organization_or_person_in_organization_assignment.
the items that are associated with the assigned_activity.
